com.hp.opencall.jmsc.test
Class LoopbackMediaGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.hp.opencall.jmsc.test.LoopbackMediaGroup

public class LoopbackMediaGroup
extends java.lang.Object

This object includes a Player and a Recorder, and the player's output is fed into the recorder's input.

The internals include two MediaGroups and two NetworkConnections, connected through RTP streams as below: 

                        ____________________________________________________________
 implementation:       | mg1 <-join-> ncs[0] <--rtp loopback--> ncs[1] <-join-> mg2 |
                       |____________________________________________________________|
                                                                            
 interface:        play - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -> record
This results in the same behaviour as two MediaGroups joined together (most implementations do not allow joining two MediaGroups directly).

Parameters:
forceInbandDTMFS - when true, the DTMFs are carried/detected inband.
This allows to generate a DTMF by playing a file that contains the corresponding modulated signal.

Get the MediaGroup that hosts the Player.
This MediaGroup is actually a full-featured MediaGroup.PLAYER_RECORDER_SIGNALDETECTOR, and all its resources are available.
